fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
* Vampiric Claw: Deal an Astral attack, increasing your Defense to *Powerful* for the night.
* Argent Storm: Rampage at your house. Deals *Powerful* Attack.
* Hunter's Aid: Become *Invincible* tonight. Deal an Astral *Unstoppable* Attack tonight. Once per game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: * You may only use one ability per night.
